title: Towel, 1920–29
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; weft over spun Z-twist; ends finished by warp ends twisted and knotted forming a fringe
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 114.5 x 32 cm (45 1/16 x 12 5/8 in.)
description: Towel with a band of patterning on both ends.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 1920–29. Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; weft over spun Z-twist; ends finished by warp ends twisted and knotted forming a fringe. 1974-92-5.
